sentences.en: Cold and drought tolerant, the new variety is adaptable to north China.
sentences.cn: 这一新品种耐寒,耐旱, 适合在中国北方生长.

sentences.en: Ethel is cheerful and adaptable, as well as gentle.
sentences.cn: 埃蒂尔不光是性情温柔, 而且爽朗随和.

sentences.en: He is an adaptable man and will soon learn the new work.
sentences.cn: 他是个适应性很强的人,很快就将学会这种工作.

sentences.en: He is not very adaptable , ie does not adapt easily to new circumstances, etc.
If space is at a premium, choose adaptable furniture that won't fill the room.
sentences.cn: 如果空间有限，就选择一些不会把房间占得很满的可改装家具。

sentences.en: It is nevertheless adaptable to detect and measure physiological activities of many other kinds.
sentences.cn: 然而它适于检验并测定许多其它种类的生理活性.

sentences.en: Living creatures must be adaptable to environmental change.
sentences.cn: 生物必须能适应环境的变化.

sentences.en: Perhaps John would have found Muller more likeable if he had been less adaptable.
sentences.cn: 如果马勒不是如此善于应变,约翰会觉得他更可爱些.

sentences.en: Successful businesses are highly adaptable to economic change.
sentences.cn: 成功的企业对于经济转变的适应能力很强.

sentences.en: Thailand could be adaptable in its dealing with distant empires.
sentences.cn: 泰国与远方的帝国打交道时可以应付裕如.

sentences.en: The American Constitution has proved adaptable in changing political conditions.
sentences.cn: 事实证明美国宪法能适应政治形势的变化。

sentences.en: The English weather has also helped to make the Englishman adaptable.
sentences.cn: 英国的天气也使英国人很容易适应环境.

sentences.en: The soil is adaptable to the growth of peanuts.
sentences.cn: 这土壤适宜于花生的生长.

sentences.en: The vehicles are large and not easily adaptable to new uses.
sentences.cn: 这些交通工具很大,不易改作新的用途.

sentences.en: They are adaptable foragers that learn to survive on a wide range of food sources.
sentences.cn: 它们是适应能力很强的觅食者，赖以生存的食物来源很广。

sentences.en: They were usually ex - public school, very English, but extremely adaptable.
sentences.cn: 他们都是中等学校出身, 英国风味很浓, 又可极其易于变通.
